ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: The attack slowdown from this song is impressive to say the least. Stacking it ON TOP of a shaman/enchanter (OMFG Tugur s is insane slow)speed debuff is just
ygData.messageBody:
The attack slowdown from this song is impressive to say the least. Stacking
it ON TOP of a shaman/enchanter (OMFG Tugur's is insane slow)speed debuff is
just plain evil. I almost feel sorry for the poor little computer controlled
mob as we watch it swing casually once every 10 sec or so.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
51st Lounge Singer, Veeshan


>From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Songs
>Date: Wed, 26 Apr 2000 15:47:54 -0400 (EDT)
>
>On Wed, 26 Apr 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> > i use it as an upgrade to chains. with 4 effects i thought it would get
> > resisted a whole lot but it has been sticking regularly.
>
>The movement slowdown is less than that of chains, I found while weaving
>it with screech. It's more along the lines of the spell snare.
>
>Athren
>
